frontmatter.subtitle_en: Joe Allen #7 v Belgium 01/07/16 Euros QF
frontmatter.subtitle_cy: Joe Allen #7 v Gwlad Belg 01/07/16 Rownd yr Wyth Olaf yr Ewros
frontmatter.desc_en: Certain shirtsare remembered for the games in which they were worn. This rather plain shirt design is a classic case of this, forever immortalised in the psyche of the Red Wall because Wales went all the way to the semi- finals of Euro 2016 wearing it, inspiring a whole nation in the process.
frontmatter.desc_cy: Caiff rhai crysau eu cofio am y gemau lle cawsant eu gwisgo. Mae’r crys eithaf di-nod hwn yn enghraifft glasurol o hynny. Crys a fydd yn byw am byth ar gof pob aelod o’r Wal Goch ar ôl gwylio Cymru yn mynd bob cam i rownd gynderfynol Ewro 2016 yn ei wisgo, gan ysbrydoli cenedl gyfan wrth wneud hynny.
